alert.note: Alert for Northwestern San Juan Mountains; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 2:54PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Ouray County through 330 PM MDT... At 254 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Loghill Village, or 19 miles south of Montrose, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Ouray County. This includes U.S. Highway 550 in Colorado between mile markers 105 and 110. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northwestern San Juan Mountains; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide
